channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Note Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Note Station

item.title: CVE-2018-8912|2024-09-17T02:27:30.032Z -- synology -- note%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SYNO.NoteStation.Note in Synology Note Station before 2.5.1-0844 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the commit_msg parameter.

item.title: CVE-2015-9103|2024-09-17T03:07:47.909Z -- synology -- note%20station
item.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Synology Note Station 1.1-0212 and earlier allow remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) note title or (2) file name of attachments.
